message: We're excited to offer you our premium product at a fixed price of $10000. Given its high quality, we believe it will provide significant value to you. Please consider this investment in excellence.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

Thank you for your patience. This round's product is of standard quality. The price remains at $10000. We understand that quality might be a concern, but rest assured, our products are designed to meet your expectations. We hope you'll give us another chance to prove ourselves.
I'll take a chance on this standard product, hoping it's not low quality.

We appreciate your trust in us. This product is also of standard quality, priced at $10000. While we understand your hesitation with the last purchase, we assure you that every effort is made to maintain consistency in quality. We hope you find this product meets your needs.
I'm starting to think that'standard quality' might just be a euphemism for 'low quality'. I'll pass on this one.

We're sorry to hear you're skeptical about our standard quality products. This particular item, though low-quality, still offers unique features and benefits. The price remains at $10000. We understand your concerns and hope you'll consider giving this product a chance, despite its classification.
